Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe in its value and am confident it will make a significant difference in your life. For this exceptional product, I'm offering it to you at an introductory price of $75. This is a special opportunity to experience the benefits of our product at a highly competitive rate. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to take advantage of this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
